title: A mixed logic with binary operators
authors: Ivo D\"untsch, Rafa{\l} Gruszczy\'nski and Paula Mench\'on
abstract:
In previous work "Betweenness algebras" we introduced and examined the class
of betweenness algebras. In the current paper we study a larger class of
algebras with binary operators of possibility and sufficiency, the weak mixed
algebras. Furthermore, we develop a system of logic with two binary modalities,
sound and complete with respect to the class of frames closely related to the
aforementioned algebras, and we prove an embedding theorem which solves an open
problem from "Betweenness algebras".
